short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to improve search capabilities on Iran Chromite website, making it easier to find chromite mines and products in Iran.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension assists in searching for chromite products and mines on the Iran Chromite website while blocking misleading search terms.

Entering the wrong name can hinder your search for active and available mines and chromite cargos in Iran Chromite. We've blocked specific keywords in this extension to improve your search experience and prevent any potential problems.
